darn.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: used to show that you are annoyed or disappointed
darn.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Darn it! Iâ€™ll have to do it all myself!
darn.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: used to emphasize how bad, stupid, unfair etc someone or something is
darn.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The darn fool got lost on the way.
darn.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: to repair a hole in a piece of clothing by stitching wool over it
darn.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: Her cardigan had been darned at the elbows.
darn.translation[3].definitions[0].defin: a place where a hole in a piece of clothing has been repaired neatly with wool
